meanings.definition: The quality of being exotic or foreign.
meanings.sent1: The exoticness of the spices in the dish made it taste unique.
meanings.sent2: The zoo was full of exoticness with animals from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The exoticness of the new student's accent brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The exoticness of the music transported me to a faraway land.
meanings.sent5: The exoticness of the rare flower captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The state of being unusual or strikingly different.
meanings.sent1: The exoticness of the purple sky during the storm was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The exoticness of the fashion choices at the event turned heads.
meanings.sent3: The exoticness of the idea to build a house upside down was intriguing.
meanings.sent4: The exoticness of the concept art challenged traditional norms.
meanings.sent5: The exoticness of the sculpture made it a focal point in the gallery.
